price: Dize: "Caminhai, na terra; em seguida, olhai como foi o fim dos desmentidores"
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi thumma unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
